content: in this legal case the court of novara ruled in favor of the plaintiff who wanted to dissolve a joint ownership of a property in novara the property was originally owned by someone who passed away and their siblings became coowners the plaintiff requested the dissolution and sale of the property the court declared the defendants in default and ordered a technical consultancy which confirmed the ownership and indivisibility of the property as a result the court ordered the sale of the property and the allocation of the proceeds among the coowners the defendants were also ordered to pay the costs of the litigation the court in novara made a final ruling granting the plaintiffs request to dissolve the joint ownership the property which has 5 rooms will be divided among the parties involved the plaintiff is responsible for covering the trial costs and dividing the costs of the technical expert among the parties the court also issued a separate order for the sale of the property this decision was made on april 29 2010
